snippet: The Federal Election Commission has made a travesty of its mission by giving violators permission to break the limits on spending and disclosure.
abstract: Editorial criticizes Federal Election Commission for making travesty of its mission and encouraging bad behavior in elections rather than stopping it, particularly with respect to spending limits; calls for reforming commission in way that prevents deadlocks, which Republicans have used to push past limits on campaign spending and disclosure.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Election Commission has made a travesty of its mission by giving violators permission to break the limits on spending and disclosure.
